name: tool_process_youtube_link
description:
SUMMARY: Retrieves and processes the transcript (subtitles) from a specific YouTube video URL.

LOGIC (ЛОГИКА РАБОТЫ):
1. Parses the video ID from the provided URL.
2. Calls the transcription MCP/API to check for available captions (manual or auto-generated).
3. Downloads the transcript tracks and concatenates them into a single readable string.
4. Returns the full text.

RETURN VALUE (ВОЗВРАЩАЕМОЕ ЗНАЧЕНИЕ):
Returns a JSON object: { "status": "success" | "error", "content": "string (the full transcript)", "video_title": "string", "error_detail": "string (optional)" }.

ERRORS (ВОЗМОЖНЫЕ ОШИБКИ):
- "VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE": Video is private, deleted, or geoblocked.
- "NO_TRANSCRIPT_FOUND": Video has no captions enabled.
- "INVALID_URL": URL does not point to a valid YouTube watch page.

url.description: The full YouTube watch URL (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=...).
